name: Coulomb AI
headline: Battery Observability Platform for Electric Vehicles
description: At Coulomb AI, we envision a future powered by the seamless integration of AI and battery technologies, creating a powerful synergy to combat climate change. We build category-leading software that can significantly improve battery lifespan and performance by employing advanced predictive analytics, real-time monitoring, and adaptive battery management algorithms.

founders.name: Khushboo Shrivastava, Founder
founders.description: Khushboo is currently the CEO of Coulomb AI. She is an award-winning Data Scientist with over 6 years of experience in automotive enterprise products development such as car-sharing Platforms and Fleet Management Software.

founders.name: Santanu Mondal, Founder
founders.description: Santanu is the Co Founder and CTO of Coulomb. He has extensive experience of working as a product lead in Electric vehicles, Battery Management and charging systems. He has spent 6 years working on Automobiles  at General Motors. He graduated in Mechanical Engineering from IIT Bombay, India.

generated_description:
Coulomb AI, founded in 2021 and hailing from Bengaluru, India, is on a mission that resonates deeply with some of the most pressing challenges of our times: climate change and the future of electric vehicles (EVs). As part of Y Combinator’s S21 batch, the company is carving out its niche by offering a Battery Observability Platform that leverages artificial intelligence to enhance battery lifespan and performance.

The tech world often revolves around the latest shiny tools, but Coulomb AI gets it. Their focus is straightforward: utilize advanced predictive analytics, real-time monitoring, and smart battery management algorithms to provide visibility into battery operations. This isn't just about maximizing performance; it's about sustainability, ensuring that we can transition to a zero-emissions future more effectively.

Coulomb AI’s core offerings include:
- **Battery Observability Platform**: Get comprehensive insights into battery operations.
- **Battery Health Assessment**: Access in-depth analytics to determine the health of your batteries.
- **Solutions for Fleets**: Designed to provide zero downtime while optimizing battery usage.

Their customer base isn't just theoretical; they cater to battery manufacturers, offer battery-as-a-service solutions, and work with automotive OEMs, demonstrating a clear understanding of the industry landscape.

On the metrics of success, Coulomb AI emphasizes the urgency of addressing frequent industry pain points—unreliable range predictions, unpredictable battery failures, and accelerated degradation—all of which have significant economic implications for businesses relying on battery technology.

With a compact, passionate team of five, they are bolstered by the backing of Y Combinator and a shared vision for a sustainable future. They're not just building software; they're actively participating in shaping the future of energy storage solutions.

In a world where technology often feels disconnected from real-world needs, Coulomb AI stands out with a clear, impactful mission: to optimize battery life and performance while contributing to a greener planet. If you want to dive deeper, check out [Coulomb AI’s website](https://coulomb.ai/) for more insight into their innovative solutions and ongoing projects.
